content:
It was my pleasure! I'm thrilled to have been able to help you explore the possibilities for your inherited plot of land and introduce you to the concept of permaculture. It's a fascinating topic, and I'm sure you'll find it rewarding to learn more about it.

Remember, permaculture is all about working with nature and creating a harmonious relationship between humans and the environment. It's a journey, and it's okay to start small and learn as you go.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, don't hesitate to reach out. I'll be here to help. Good luck with your permaculture adventure, and I hope you'll share your progress with me in the future!

(And congratulations to your friend Sarah on her new home - it sounds like a lovely place!)
